name: Avoid large Classes - too many Methods
description:
Classes should have less than a defined number of Methods.
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
Associated to each ABAP Class with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The number of Methods/Event Methods/Constructors
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, Classes should not have too many Methods.
remediation: Review the Class design to reduce the number of Methods
